@mrry I have updated again, and the latest version fixed the bugs as below:

  • Delete the redundant argument FLAGS.num_workers
  • num_gpu -> num_gpus
  • Support to use /cpu:0 instead of /gpu:# when setting num_gpus=0
  • Combine the if FLAGS.sync_replicas statement to SyncReplicasOptimizer block.
  • Add FLAGS.job_name, FLAGS.task_index and FLAGS.num_gpus available check. That is, it will raise an exception if any of them is not set, or unknown

body:
@mrry  I have updated again, and the latest version fixed the bugs as below:
- Delete the redundant argument `FLAGS.num_workers` 
- `num_gpu` -> `num_gpus`
- Support to use `/cpu:0` instead of `/gpu:#` when setting `num_gpus=0` 
- Combine the `if FLAGS.sync_replicas` statement to `SyncReplicasOptimizer` block.
- Add `FLAGS.job_name`, `FLAGS.task_index` and `FLAGS.num_gpus` available check. That is, it will raise an exception if any of them is not set, or unknown
